subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Wake Forest made it much harder than Louisville fans might have preferred. But in the end, the Cardinals earned their respect with a victory in the Orange Bowl, the first B.C.S. game for these programs on the rise.
snippet: Wake Forest made it much harder than Louisville fans might have preferred. But in the end, the Cardinals earned their respect with a victory in the Orange Bowl, the first B.C.S. game for these programs on the rise.
